quality_assessment: Documentation is well-written and accurate. Minor source line reference discrepancies due to code evolution. Content is comprehensive with excellent case sensitivity documentation.

issues.description: Several source line references are slightly off from actual implementation. ErrorMatcher enum is at lines 100-114, not 100-151. Pattern matching logic is at lines 142-148 as documented.
issues.fix_suggestion: Update source line references to match current implementation: ErrorMatcher enum is at lines 100-114, Network matcher at 121-126, Timeout at 127-128, ServerError at 130-135, RateLimit at 137-140, Pattern at 142-148

issues.description: Network matcher source reference shows lines 128-132 but actual implementation is at lines 121-126
Timeout matcher source reference shows lines 133-137 but actual implementation is at lines 127-129
ServerError matcher source reference shows lines 138-142 but actual implementation is at lines 130-136
RateLimit matcher source reference shows lines 143-147 but actual implementation is at lines 137-141
Documentation correctly notes that Pattern matcher tests are not yet implemented, but the test section shows test code that doesn't exist in the actual test file for pattern matching
issues.fix_suggestion: Consider adding Pattern matcher tests to the codebase or updating documentation to reflect actual test coverage

positive_aspects: Excellent documentation of case sensitivity behavior for all matcher types
Clear explanation of Pattern matcher with (?i) flag for case-insensitive matching
Comprehensive table comparing case sensitivity across matcher types
Accurate documentation of OR logic for multiple matchers
Good examples showing both case-sensitive and case-insensitive patterns
Helpful implementation details section with code example
Clear use case descriptions for each matcher type
Accurate documentation of empty retry_on behavior
Good selective retry example showing fail-fast for non-matching errors
Documentation of invalid regex handling is accurate
improvement_suggestions: Add MkDocs Material admonitions for case sensitivity warnings
Add tabbed content blocks for YAML vs programmatic usage examples
Consider adding a visual diagram showing retry flow with error matching
Add cross-references to backoff-strategies.md for complete retry configuration
Add code annotations to the Rust implementation example for better clarity
Consider adding a 'Common Mistakes' section for pattern matching pitfalls
